attributes.review: okay first of all this app took HOURS to download i thought it was the next day after it finally downloaded , second of all as soon as i opened the app it asked me to turn on notifications and i picked allow , the moment i did that i knew i made a mistake my phone WOULD NOT stop beeping due to notifications, i even powered my phone off to make the beeping stop and it just kept on , third of all my phone would not stop glitching and being slow after the app was downloaded. i do not recommend this app and i wish i could give it less than 1 star.

attributes.review: When I first downloaded the app, it wanted to send me notifications, like the audacity!!! Then they wanted my phone number, FOR WHAT???!!!?!!?!?! So they can SPY on me? Find out who I make calls to (my mommy so shut the f*** up). The marketing team did so poorly with this app. Their logo likes like the bootleg Titans Tower (TT>TTG.) The first face I see is a lightly dusted Cheetos, with hair that looks so fake it reminds me of middle school aged girlsâ€™ friendships. It was horrific, Iâ€™ll have nightmares for weeks. Never Again!

And when I tried to change my wallpaper or anything it just shut back off for another 30 days.Also it says itâ€™s free but it actually deducts $4000 from your credit card.
